name: Jonah Hill
summary: Jonah Hill. Actor: 21 Jump Street. Jonah Hill was born and raised in Los Angeles, the son of Sharon Feldstein (née Chalkin), a fashion designer and costume stylist, and Richard Feldstein, a tour accountant for Guns N' Roses. He is the brother of music manager Jordan Feldstein and actress Beanie Feldstein. He graduated from Crossroads School in Santa Monica and went on to The New School in New York to...
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars | 8 wins & 66 nominations total
